product.accords: white floral, tuberose, woody, sweet, patchouli, vanilla
product.composition: Top notes: orange blossom; middle notes: jasmine, tuberose; base notes: vetiver, patchouli.

story.designer: Dominique Ropion, Anne Flipo, Fanny Bal
story.inspiration: Forbid yourself nothing. Allow no rules. An invitation to defy convention and embrace your individuality. As long as you have the courage to be yourself, nothing is impossible.

comments: This is the only fragrance I get complimented on everytime I use it. I’m so in love with it. Very elegant classy and feminine. It last all day and night.

Sweet, fresh, unique, modern. Patchouli doesn’t smell like angel of mugler. Since I hate most patchouli this one is great, tuberose overpowers it and it’s so balanced. I would say a perfect blind buy.
